issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
when I try to open an external application, the application tries to open it, but does not open it. With other apps as facebook and others launches correctly.
Learn Blackboard: urls Scheme: db-s88xnnuq25gizve

Code : 
Ti.Platform.openURL('db-s88xnnuq25gizve://');
fields.summary: Titanium cannot open correctly external app ( Blackboard Learn Mobile) (Android)

comments.body: Please refer to https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report on how to report a JIRA bug. There is not enough information here to review the issue. Specifically we need a working a test case and steps to reproduce. Thank you.
